message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $1,200,000?
